item.description:
Come join us on Feb 24 for American Gods by Neil Gaiman. We're delving into a bit of the sci-fi realm this time for a change and Neil Gaiman is supposed to be an excellent writer.

We're doing a repeat in terms of the location so we'll be at Unwined for this meeting. If you're a fondue fan, you'll love it. Unwined has a great cheese fondue plus an amazing selection of wine.

Normal cap of 12 people applies so RSVP as soon as you can and, as always, if your plans change, please update your RSVP so another person can join.

See you on the 24th!

group.name: The Southern NH Books and Brew Club

item.name: Meet the American Gods
